tool_description: Capitalize titles and headlines according to the title capitalization rules of various style guides.
name: Title Case Converter
title: Title Case Converter

api_list.name: Title Case
api_list.description: Converts a title to title case. See the About page for a detailed explanation of the parameters.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The text to be converted to title case. Maximum length: 300 characters
required_parameters.default: thanks for opting in to stay in touch

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description: Specifies the title case style to be used. Possible values are: `AMA`, `AP`, `APA`,`BB`,  `CMOS`, `MLA`, `NYT`, `WP`

optional_parameters.name: preserveAllCaps
optional_parameters.description: Specifies whether words in all caps should be kept unchanged. Possible values are: `0` (default), `false`, `1`, `true`, `auto`.

optional_parameters.name: useStraightQuotes
optional_parameters.description: Specifies if quotes should be output as \\\"straight\\\" quotes instead of “curly” quotes. Possible values are: `0` (default), `false`, `1`, `true`.

optional_parameters.name: tagSpeciesNames
optional_parameters.description: Specifies if scientific species names should be tagged. Possible values are: `0` (default, no tagging), `1` (the complete species name is tagged using `<ScientificName>`), `2` (the parts of the species name that are customarily written in italics are tagged using `<em>`).
